description.value:
Relic Mastercrafted Cybernetic of the Iron Hands. Once it has bonded with the user, they gain Regeneration (5) Trait, and become immune to Fatigue. If worn for more than a single mission, the wearer suffers 1d10+5 temporary Toughness Damage for each subsequent mission. If not removed, the character will die if reahcing 0 or lower Toughness.

Requirements

Iron Hands Only

Effect: Famed

Notes: 30 R
